We measure change severity , duration , incapacitation score Rating Scale Psychogenic Movement Disorders ( RSPMD ) 10 adult patient clinically definite PsyD one month intramuscular injection onabotulinumtoxinA select muscle affect limb ( ) . We examine extent change severity disability PsyD , measure RSPMD , 12 weekly CBT session , influence pre-CBT injection onabotulinumtoxinA .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet standard criterion clinically definite PsyD ; 17 PsyD severity disability score â‰¥ 10 measure RSPMD ( Appendix 1 ) ; 10 Dystonic posturing must present without remission period longer 1 year . Between age 18 75 , inclusive Prior treatment BoNT Presence clinically unstable medical condition condition evaluation Concurrent participation another investigational drug device study within 30 day prior study enrollment . We also exclude subject medical disorder deem increased risk expose BoNT , include myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , neuromuscular disorder .
